verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Noah, <WH5146> Come <WH935> you and all <WH3605> your house <WH1004> into <WH413> the ark; <WH8392> for you have I seen <WH7200> righteous <WH6662> before <WH6440> me in this <WH2088> generation. <WH1755>

Of every <WH3605> clean <WH2889> beast <WH929> you shall take <WH3947> to you by sevens, <WH7651> the male <WH376> and his female: <WH802> and of beasts <WH929> that are not clean <WH2889> by two, <WH8147> the male <WH376> and his female. <WH802>

Of fowls <WH5775> also <WH1571> of the air <WH8064> by sevens, <WH7651> the male <WH2145> and the female; <WH5347> to keep seed <WH2233> alive <WH2421> on the face <WH6440> of all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>

For yet <WH5750> seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> and I will cause it to rain <WH4305> on the earth <WH776> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights; <WH3915> and every <WH3605> living substance <WH3351> that I have made <WH6213> will I destroy <WH4229> from off <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth. <WH127>
And Noah <WH5146> did <WH6213> according to all <WH3605> that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> him.
And Noah <WH5146> was six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when the flood <WH3999> of waters <WH4325> was on the earth. <WH776>

And Noah <WH5146> went <WH935> in, and his sons, <WH1121> and his wife, <WH802> and his sons' <WH1121>wives <WH802> with him, into <WH413> the ark, <WH8392> because <WH6440> of the waters <WH4325> of the flood. <WH3999>
Of clean <WH2889> beasts, <WH929> and of beasts <WH929> that are not clean, <WH2889> and of fowls, <WH5775> and of every <WH3605> thing that creeps <WH7430> on the earth, <WH127>
There went <WH935> in two <WH8147> and two <WH8147> to Noah <WH5146> into <WH413> the ark, <WH8392> the male <WH2145> and the female, <WH5347> as God <WH430> had commanded <WH6680> Noah. <WH5146>
And it came <WH1961> to pass after seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> that the waters <WH4325> of the flood <WH3999> were on the earth. <WH776>

In the six <WH8337> hundredth <WH3967> year <WH8141> of Noah's <WH5146> life, <WH2416> in the second <WH8145> month, <WH2320> the seventeenth <WH7651> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH2320> the same <WH2088> day <WH3117> were all <WH3605> the fountains <WH4599> of the great <WH7227> deep <WH8415> broken <WH1234> up, and the windows <WH699> of heaven <WH8064> were opened. <WH6605>
And the rain <WH1653> was on the earth <WH776> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights. <WH3915>

In the selfsame <WH2088> <WH6106> day <WH3117> entered <WH935> Noah, <WH5146> and Shem, <WH8035> and Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth, <WH3315> the sons <WH1121> of Noah, <WH5146> and Noah's <WH5146> wife, <WH802> and the three <WH7969> wives <WH802> of his sons <WH1121> with them, into <WH413> the ark; <WH8392>

They, and every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> after his kind, <WH4327> and all <WH3605> the cattle <WH929> after their kind, <WH4327> and every <WH3605> creeping <WH7431> thing that creeps <WH7430> on the earth <WH776> after his kind, <WH4327> and every <WH3605> fowl <WH5775> after his kind, <WH4327> every <WH3605> bird <WH6833> of every <WH3605> sort. <WH3671>
And they went <WH935> in to Noah <WH5146> into <WH413> the ark, <WH8392> two <WH8147> and two <WH8147> of all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> wherein <WH834> is the breath <WH7307> of life. <WH2416>
And they that went <WH935> in, went <WH935> in male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> of all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> as God <WH430> had commanded <WH6680> him: and the LORD <WH3068> shut <WH5462> him in.

And the flood <WH3999> was forty <WH705> days <WH3117> on the earth; <WH776> and the waters <WH4325> increased, <WH7235> and bore <WH5375> up the ark, <WH8392> and it was lift <WH7311> up above <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>
And the waters <WH4325> prevailed, <WH1396> and were increased <WH7235> greatly <WH3966> on the earth; <WH776> and the ark <WH8392> went <WH3212> on the face <WH6440> of the waters. <WH4325>

And the waters <WH4325> prevailed <WH1396> exceedingly <WH3966> on the earth; <WH776> and all <WH3605> the high <WH1364> hills, <WH2022> that were under <WH8478> the whole <WH3605> heaven, <WH8064> were covered. <WH3680>
Fifteen <WH6240> cubits <WH520> upward <WH4605> did the waters <WH4325> prevail; <WH1396> and the mountains <WH2022> were covered. <WH3680>

And all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> died <WH1478> that moved <WH7430> on the earth, <WH776> both of fowl, <WH5775> and of cattle, <WH929> and of beast, <WH2416> and of every <WH3605> creeping <WH8318> thing that creeps <WH8317> on the earth, <WH776> and every <WH3605> man: <WH120>
All <WH3605> in whose <WH834> nostrils <WH639> was the breath <WH5397> of life, <WH2416> of all <WH3605> that was in the dry <WH2724> land, died. <WH4191>

And every <WH3605> living substance <WH3351> was destroyed <WH4229> which <WH834> was on the face <WH6440> of the ground, <WH127> both man, <WH120> and cattle, <WH929> and the creeping <WH7431> things, and the fowl <WH5775> of the heaven; <WH8064> and they were destroyed <WH4229> from the earth: <WH776> and Noah <WH5146> only <WH389> remained <WH7604> alive, and they that were with him in the ark. <WH8392>
And the waters <WH4325> prevailed <WH1396> on the earth <WH776> an hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> days. <WH3117>
